## Go.makeMove() method

Make a move on the IPvGO subnet gameboard, and await the opponent's response. x:0 y:0 represents the bottom-left corner of the board in the UI.

**Signature:**

```typescript
makeMove(x: number, y: number): Promise<Play>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number |  |
|  y | number |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Play](./bitburner.play.md)<!-- -->&gt;

a promise that contains the opponent's move (or pass) in response, or an indication if the game has ended

## Remarks

RAM cost: 2 GB
